User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the InfluenceWise application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity, matching Firebase Auth UID.

name.description: The full name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

avatar.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Only the authenticated user can access their own profile.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.
